磯釣り: (いそずり) - surf fishing; rock fishing; fishing from rocks by the shore
磯馴: (そなれ) - Japanese garden juniper; dwarf Japanese garden juniper; Juniperus procumbens; J. chinensis var. procumbens
磯魚: (いそうお) - inshore fish; fish that lives in rocky coastal waters
磯鵯: (イソヒヨドリ) - blue rock-thrush (Monticola solitarius)
礁湖: (しょうこ) - barrier lagoon; coral-reef lagoon
礎を築く: (いしずえをきずく) - to lay the foundation (for)
礑と: (はったと) - (はったと is stronger) suddenly; sharply (e.g.glancing, making a sound); fiercely; completely
礫: (れき) - Small Stones , stone (usado para arremessar)
礬水: (どうさ) - size (solution for stiffening textiles, etc.)
礬砂: (どうさ) - size (solution for stiffening textiles, etc.)
示し: (shimeshi) - lesson, discipline, example (ex.: dar um mau exemplo); revelation
示しがつかない: (しめしがつかない) - setting a bad example to others
示し合せる: (しめしあわせる) - to arrange beforehand; to make a sign to each other; to conspire
示し合わす: (しめしあわす) - to conspire (with); to prearrange
示し合わせる: (しめしあわせる) - to arrange beforehand; to make a sign to each other; to conspire
示す: (しめす) - to (take out and) show/to demonstrate/to tell/to exemplify/to make apparent; to point out (finger, clock hand, needle, etc.); to indicate/to show/to represent/to signify/to display
示偏: (しめすへん) - (as in 神) kanji "show" radical at left (radical 113)
示唆的: (しさてき) - suggestive; pregnant (e.g. pregnant pause)
示寂: (じじゃく) - death of a high-ranking priest
示導動機: (しどうどうき) - leitmotif; leitmotiv; leading motive
示性値: (しせいち) - characteristic value; physical or chemical properties; figure of merit
示準化石: (じじゅんかせき) - index fossil (fossil which suggests a date of the formation of a rock stratum); key fossil; leading fossil
示談交渉: (じだんこうしょう) - settlement negotiation (insurance)
示談金: (じだんきん) - settlement money; compensation to settle a case out of court
礼: (rei/rai) - thanks , thanks, gratitude; manners, etiquette; bow; reward, gift
礼には及ばない: (れいにはおよばない) - it's nothing; don't mention it; no thanks necessary
礼をつくす: (れいをつくす) - to accord someone every courtesy
礼を失する: (れいをしっする) - to be impolite; to be discourteous
礼を尽くす: (れいをつくす) - to accord someone every courtesy
礼儀感覚: (れいぎかんかく) - (yoji) sense of decorum; attention to the common civilities of life
礼儀正しい: (れいぎただしい) - courteous; decorous; polite
礼儀知らず: (れいぎしらず) - rudeness; impoliteness; mannerlessness; snottiness
礼冠: (れいかん) - crown or head-ornament worn with formal or ceremonial clothes by nobility (ritsuryo system)
礼参り: (れいまいり) - thanksgiving visit to a shrine
礼回り: (れいまわり) - making the rounds to express thanks
礼奉公: (れいぼうこう) - free service after one has finished one's apprenticeship
礼拝: (reihai) - worship (especialmente cristão), adoration, divine service; worship (esp. Buddhist and Shinto)
礼拝堂: (らいはいどう) - (れいはいどう only) chapel/place of worship (esp. Christian); (らいはいどう only) place of worship (esp. Buddhist and Shinto)
礼拝式: (れいはいしき) - religious service; religious practice
礼拝所: (れいはいしょ) - place of worship
礼文草: (レブンソウ) - Oxytropis megalantha (species of locoweed)
礼服: (れいふく) - ceremonial dress; evening dress; dress suit; morning suit
礼状: (れいじょう) - acknowledgment; acknowledgement; letter of thanks
礼盤: (らいばん) - platform in front of a temple's principal image, from which the officiating monk chants
礼紙: (らいし) - paper for wrapping a letter; margin of a letter
礼記: (らいき) - the Li Ji or Book of Rites - one of the Five Classics
礼讃: (らいさん) - praise; worship; adoration; glorification
礼讃舞: (らいさんまい) - dance recital praising Buddha, which accompanies the recital of a gatha (in the Pure Land Sect of Buddhism)
礼賛: (らいさん) - praise; worship; adoration; glorification
礼遇: (れいぐう) - courteous reception; honorable treatment; honourable treatment
礼金: (れいきん) - finder's fee/reward/honorarium; key money
社中: (しゃちゅう) - in a company; troupe
社主: (しゃしゅ) - company head or owner
社交: (しゃこう) - social life; social intercourse
